description.value: Walls are just vertical floors to you. Falling is still dangerous, of course, but you've gotten good at catching yourself.

system.benefits: Climb at full movement speed (no reduction). Can attempt normally impossible climbs (smooth stone, ice, ceilings) with [[/check skill=athletics]] (Hard task). When falling during a climb, automatically get [[/check skill=acrobatics]] to catch yourself (1 success = catch and stop fall, 2 successes = catch and don't take damage)
